++ Code refactoring of done task

+ Main Feature added for Storage load - Reads in the task.txt and translate into multiple Tasks within the parent class TaskList.
+ Made Task class an abstract class

+TaskListDecoder

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7 - A more OOP + Implement Storage Save() Feature

Level 7 A-More OOP + Implement DeleteTaskCommand + Fix bug whereby Deadline and Event Task was not saved properly upon deletion - saveAllTask(List<Task> allTask) + Introduce getBy method for Deadline and Event Tasks respectively
commitResults.messageBody: + Code refactoring rename of ui printToDo method to printAddSingleTask

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7 A-MoreOOP + Code Refactoring for UI class + Newly added DoneTaskCommand to cater for Done Task feature + Fix bugs in Parser - Regex now takes in /by - deadline /at - event

Level-8 Dates and Time + Store Task attributes as date objects (Minimal) + Implement Find command - Allow user to find deadline/events occurring on a specific date (Stretch goal)   	- Additional FindTaskByDateCommand class file - Remove unnecessary class file 'GreetEchoExit' - Remove unnecessary class file 'TaskAction' (Previously CommandEnum) - Remove unnecessary class file 'addList' Previously Duke main

Level 8 A-JavaDoc Add JavaDoc comments to the code. +Minimal: Add header comments to at least half of the non-private classes/methods. +Stretch goal: Add header comments to all non-private classes/methods, and non-trivial private methods. (Best Effort)
Level 8 - Rename source folder back from Duke back to correct convention java
Week 9 A-Junit Set foundation packages for test/java folders + test/java/data + test/java/parser + test/java/storage + test/java/ui
commitResults.messageBody: Added test cases for data Test classes (DeadlineTest, EventTest, TaskListTest, TaskTest, TodoTest)

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-8 Add Junit Test Added Junit Test for + ParserTest + StorageTest

Code refactoring in Storage
+ init() method within load()

*Fix bug whereby deleteTask and markAsDoneTask goes out of bounds

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 8 Fix Test Case Bugs
Level 8 Merge Branches Tweak README.md
Week 10 - Add Individual Feature + C-Help Give help to users Provide in-App guidance to users. Minimal: add a command to access a help page.
Level 9, A-CodingStandard, A-CodeQuality + Implement 'Find' feature of task by keyword + Rename SearchTaskByDateCommand, previously sharing the same keyword

Week 11 - Improve the individual feature (or add another) + Added a NEW feature of C-Sort. Sorts Task event/deadline by chronological order - Currently implementation only prints out the sorted list (Without saving to txt file)
Level 10 Add GUI to Duke - In progress lay out foundation + javaFX , javaFXML
Implementing Duke GUI
Implemented Duke Chat Box on GUI
Duke GUI Implementation: Add line break when printing help commands
Duke GUI Implementation: Throw back exception to console on invalid command
Added more Test Cases
Code Refactoring - Applying Static Analysis

+ Code Refactoring - Exception Handling, GUI and Console Print Outputs + Added New function to Undo Task that's has been mark done + Bug Fix - Added UndoTaskCommand and FindTaskByKeyword into help function
+ Added check for duplicated task - If user tries to add a task with the same task description [Duplicates] + Print out the total number of tasks in the list upon list, sort commands are initiated.
+ Added Assertion checks in code. + Enhance sort feature to sort tasks - event/deadline that has been marked done/completed.
Code Refactoring + Added missing sort help command
Fix bug whereby delete, done and undo task commands throws indexOutOfBounds. + [Fixed] --> Change the index of task at decrement by 1 only at a one place (Do not manipulate the value inputs all over)
Code Refactoring for showing total count of Task found by Keyword.
